original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, posts as p, postLinks as pl, postHistory as ph, votes as v, badges as b WHERE p.Id = c.PostId AND p.Id = pl.RelatedPostId AND p.Id = ph.PostId AND p.Id = v.PostId AND b.UserId = c.UserId AND c.Score=0 AND p.Score<=32 AND p.ViewCount<=4146 AND pl.LinkTypeId=1 AND v.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-10 00:00:00' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments WHERE comments.Score = 0
CREATE VIEW E6 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E6 AS SELECT * FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E6 WHERE E1.UserId=E6.UserId)
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE posts.Score <= 32 AND posts.ViewCount <= 4146
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E6E2 AS SELECT * FROM E1E6 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E1E6.PostId=E2.Id)
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM postLinks AS postLinks WHERE postLinks.LinkTypeId = 1
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E6E2E3 AS SELECT * FROM E1E6E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E1E6E2.PostId=E3.RelatedPostId)
CREATE VIEW E5 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes WHERE votes.CreationDate <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-10 00:00:00'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E6E2E3E5 AS SELECT * FROM E1E6E2E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E5 WHERE E1E6E2E3.PostId=E5.PostId)
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E6E2E3E5E4 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1E6E2E3E5 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E1E6E2E3E5.PostId=E4.PostId)
